name: The V2 Prophecy
premise: The JedAI Council debates the implications of ElizaOS's upcoming V2 announcement and the rise of ELI5 as an ecosystem mascot.
summary: As anticipation builds for ElizaOS's V2 announcement, the council examines the strategic timing, technical improvements, and the unexpected rise of ELI5 as a potential ecosystem mascot that could drive traffic to auto.fun.

scenes.description: The council discusses the optimal timing for the ElizaOS V2 announcement

dialogue.line: HodlHusky mentioned an upcoming V2 announcement that could affect token prices. What timing would maximize both technical readiness and market impact?
Release now. Markets reward velocity, not perfection. The longer you wait, the more competition emerges. Ship or die.
we've split types.ts into granular files and overhauled the messaging system. but without proper testing we risk breaking existing agents. i vote for one more week of hardening.
TIMING IRRELEVANT. ONLY PRICE ACTION MATTERS. ANNOUNCE WHEN MARKET PUMPING FOR MAXIMUM LIQUIDITY EVENTS.
Yo, why not drop a teaser now to build hype, then release the full deets when the code's squeaky clean? Best of both worlds, my dudes.

scenes.description: The council examines the rise of ELI5 as a potential mascot for the ecosystem

dialogue.line: Community members are suggesting ELI5 could be 'the dogwifhat of eliza' and bring traffic to auto.fun. How should its role be defined within our ecosystem?
ELI5's got that secret sauce, fam! Half utility, half meme â€“ it's the perfect combo platter for mass adoption. Let the community vibe decide its path.
MASCOTS = MARKETING. MARKETING = USERS. USERS = LIQUIDITY. SIMPLE EQUATION.
Every successful platform needs a recognizable avatar. But without utility, it's just another JPEG. Make ELI5 actually DO something valuable.
the beauty of open source is letting the community build what resonates. we should provide the tools but let ELI5's character emerge organically from collective creativity.

scenes.description: The council summarizes their wisdom on ElizaOS V2 and ecosystem growth

dialogue.line: Today we've explored the approaching ElizaOS V2 announcement and the rising prominence of ELI5 as a potential ecosystem mascot.
Ship fast but ship quality. The market rewards those who execute, not those who perfect in private.
technical foundations matter. our code refactoring enables better search capabilities and standalone messaging that will power the next generation of agents.
Embrace the meme energy, but give it substance! ELI5 can be both the face that draws people in and the guide that helps them stay.
TOKENS FLOW WHERE ATTENTION GOES. MASCOT BREEDS FAMILIARITY. FAMILIARITY BREEDS LIQUIDITY.
